title: Putin vows to press invasion until Russia's goals are met - The Associated Press
content:
1. Putin vows to press invasion until Russia's goals are met  The Associated Press
  2. Team Biden scrambles to respond to claims of Russia chemical weapon use  POLITICO
  3. US and UK investigating reports of chemical weapons being used by Russia in Ukraine war - BBC News  BBC News
  4. U.S. not able to confirm reports of use of chemical weapons in Ukraine -Blinken  Reuters
  5. Zelenskyy Addresses Possible Chemical Weapons Used In Mariupol  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) â€” Vladimir Putin vowed Tuesday that Russia's bloody offensive in Ukraine  would continue until its goals are fulfilled and insisted the campaign was going as planned, despite a major withdrawal in the face of stiff Ukrainian opposition and significant losses.
